events.event_description: The EIA released new data showing increased coal transportation costs to the electric power sector in 2022, based on Form EIA-923 submissions from power plant operators.
events.citation: The cost of transporting coal to the electric power sector increased in 2022

events.event_description: EIA published comprehensive data tables showing coal transportation costs across regions, states, and transportation modes in both nominal and real 2022 dollars.
events.citation: The data release based on our Form EIA-923 includes tables with costs, in nominal and real (2022) dollars, across regions, states, and modes of transportation.
